Related Experience

UX Developer (July 2015 - Present)

LifeWay Christian Resources, Nashville, TN
  • Develop and maintain numerous websites for events hosted by LifeWay Christian Resources.
  • Develop and maintain various LifeWay websites using WordPress as a CMS.
  • Train clients to understand and edit content on the website the team and I generate.
  • Work consistently and cooperatively with other LifeWay UX employees.
  • Work within Photoshop and Illustrator to generate designs used in slideshows for LifeWay.com.

Frontend Developer (Spring 2014 - Spring 2015)

Technical Services Associates Inc., Mechanicsburg, PA,
  • Assisted with developing a new application for the company using JavaScript, HTML and CSS
  • Debugged application where needed and produced efficient results to problems
  • Improved project management skills by taking part in the business’ SCRUM process
  • Stayed synchronized with team members in Peru by updating and committing code to SVN

College Project (Spring, 2015)

Cure International, Senior Project
  • Modified CURE’s Ministry model using Ember and CouchDb so that users can effectively and efficiently control and monitor the content of their patients.

Freelance Project (Fall, 2014)

SEBO Men’s Accessories
  • Modified the design of SEBO Men’s Accessories website based upon the owner’s requests.
  • Worked with the CMS WordPress and Shopify.
